[vc_row el_class=”tj-about-story-section”][vc_column][mk_padding_divider size=”100″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/12″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”10/12″][mk_fancy_title tag_name=”h3″ size=”36″ font_weight=”600″ font_family=”none” align=”center”]Our Story[/mk_fancy_title][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1605183855464{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Tailor junction is an online boutique which takes care of all stitching requirements of men, women and kids, be it alterations or fresh stitching or customization or redo of old saree. We provide doorstep services without any minimum price requirements. We have wide range of fabrics and accessories. Our motive is to make relations not customers. So until and unless our customers are not satisfied with our work, we keep on giving them services. Our model of tailoring is not like others who work only for money, we give value to your money and time.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/12″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][mk_padding_divider size=”80″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row fullwidth=”true” fullwidth_content=”false” equal_columns=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1522544416132{background-color: #f7f4ef !important;}”][vc_column][mk_padding_divider size=”100″][vc_row_inner el_class=”tj-about-exp-section”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][mk_fancy_title tag_name=”h3″ size=”36″ font_weight=”600″ font_family=”none” responsive_align=”left” el_class=”tj-about-exp-section-title”]Team Of Experienced
Tailors[/mk_fancy_title][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1522544596623{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]We have a team of the experienced tailor and visionary designers, who can create a perfect outfit with pinch of your taste in it. Even after delivery of outfit, if there is any alteration, we do it again, and deliver it again.

We have a separate team for maternity and kids outfits. Maternity outfit are very rarely available, and office going mothers face problem, so in order to resolve their problem we have come out with this section, who takes care of all small needs of pregnant women and new mothers. Same with small kids, it is very difficult to find a dream outfit for small kids, here also we have different section to deal with. You just need to make a call and call a designer at your place, she will create an outfit for you at your doorstep, and home comfort.

Tailor junction will full fill all boutique requirements at your home comfort, infact you will get wide range of fabrics and accessories at one click. Our tailor will show you fabric samples and colors that you can choose at doorstep and ask them to get it stitched.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”619″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1522544387132{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][mk_padding_divider size=”100″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row fullwidth=”true” fullwidth_content=”false” el_class=”tj-services-section”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][mk_padding_divider size=”100″][mk_fancy_title tag_name=”h3″ size=”36″ font_weight=”600″ margin_bottom=”0″ font_family=”none” align=”center”]Our Services[/mk_fancy_title][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1522546088028{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

From everyday clothing such as jeans to men suits or dresses, we modify and
tailor as per your requests with great results.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class=”custom-service-section”][vc_column_inner el_class=”home-services” width=”1/3″][mk_image src=”https://tailorjunction.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/custom-tailoring-for-men.jpg” image_size=”full” link=”https://tailorjunction.com/custom-tailoring-for-men/” align=”center” margin_bottom=”30″][vc_column_text align=”center”]

Custom Tailoring Services For Men

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”home-services” width=”1/3″][mk_image src=”https://tailorjunction.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/custom-tailoring-services-for-women.jpg” image_size=”full” link=”https://tailorjunction.com/custom-tailoring-for-women/” target=”_blank” margin_bottom=”30″][vc_column_text align=”center”]

Custom Tailoring Services For Women

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”home-services” width=”1/3″][mk_image src=”https://tailorjunction.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/custom-tailoring-for-kids-2.jpg” image_size=”full” link=”https://tailorjunction.com/custom-tailoring-for-kids/” target=”_blank” margin_bottom=”30″][vc_column_text align=”center”]

Custom Tailoring Services For Kids

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”home-services” width=”1/3″][mk_image src=”https://tailorjunction.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/maternity-dresses.jpg” image_size=”full” link=”https://tailorjunction.com/maternity-dresses/” target=”_blank” margin_bottom=”30″][vc_column_text align=”center”]

Maternity Dresses

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”home-services” width=”1/3″][mk_image src=”https://tailorjunction.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/fabrics.jpg” image_size=”full” link=”https://tailorjunction.com/fabric/” target=”_blank” margin_bottom=”30″][vc_column_text align=”center”]

Fabrics

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”home-services” width=”1/3″][mk_image src=”https://tailorjunction.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/alteration-repair.jpg” image_size=”full” link=”https://tailorjunction.com/alteration-repair/” target=”_blank” margin_bottom=”30″][vc_column_text align=”center”]

Alteration & Repair
